text:
Cotton was auctioned for Rs. 4 crore at the Konganapuram branch of the Tiruchengode Agricultural Producers Marketing Cooperative Society held on Saturday.

While DCH variety fetched a price between Rs. 5,800 and Rs. 6,300 per bag, surabi variety fetched between Rs. 5,800 and Rs. 6,360 per bag.

Cotton farmers from Edappadi, Mettur, Sankagiri, Dharmapuri, Krishnagiri, Tiruvannamalai brought about 20,000 bags of cotton and they were auctioned for Rs. 4 crore.
title: Cotton auctioned for Rs. 4 crore
